meta.notes: Public / declassified / alleged / folklore categories only. Fill source_list with URLs or citations.

Project Blue Book.summary: USAF public UFO study; final report: no evidence of extraterrestrial threat

AAWSAP.summary: Advanced Aerospace Weapons Systems Application Program (reported)

Project Moon Dust.summary: Documented references to recovery of foreign objects; some materials declassified, program details limited

Project Looking Glass.summary: Alleged program name appearing in conspiracy literature; no confirmed public record

Project Winter Haven.summary: Unconfirmed program name in public rumor space

Genesis_Nephilim.summary: Genesis 6: 'sons of God' + 'daughters of men' produce 'Nephilim'.

Book_of_Enoch_Watchers.summary: Watchers descend, teach forbidden arts, beget giants; Flood/judgment narrative.

Sumerian_Apkallu.summary: Semi-divine sages teaching arts pre-Flood; Sumerian King List shows antediluvian long-lived kings.

Men_in_Black.summary: Post-1950s UFO subculture motif; agents in black suits; largely urban legend/media trope.

Crawlers_Pale_Crawlers.summary: Internet-era cryptid reports; no verified evidence.

Demons.summary: Religious traditions describe demonic entities; theological and folkloric material only.

Fravor_TicTac_2004.summary: Tic-Tac object, unusual maneuvering/acceleration; radar/visual reports

Ryan_Graves_reports.summary: Multiple naval encounters; objects with unexplained performance
